scripts.emulators:e2e: export FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 && export FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8080 && export FUNCTIONS_EMULATOR=true && export STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9199 && export FIREBASE_CONFIG='{"projectId":"demo-project","storageBucket":"demo-project.appspot.com"}' && export INTERNAL_API_KEY=4d522cbb22ae4ad19fe69211623a3a6bf8e9c098a16593b0ca0e0c0359c6f2d0 && firebase emulators:start --only auth,functions,storage
scripts.e2e:setup: docker compose --env-file .env.test -f compose.test.yaml up -d && npx dotenv -e .env -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy && npx dotenv -e .env -e .env.test -- npm run seed:test
scripts.e2e:setupci: npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run seed:test
scripts.test:e2eci:local: npm run e2e:setup && concurrently -k -n 'EMULATORS,APP,CYPRESS' -c 'blue.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold' "npm run emulators:e2e" "npm run dev:cyp" "npm run wait-and-test"
scripts.test:e2e:local: npm run e2e:setup && concurrently -k -n 'EMULATORS,APP,CYPRESS' -c 'blue.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold' "npm run emulators:e2e" "npm run dev:cyp" "npm run wait-and-open"
scripts.test:e2eci: npm run e2e:setupci && concurrently -k --success first  -n 'APP,CYPRESS' -c 'green.bold,magenta.bold' "npm run dev:cypci" "npm run wait-and-test"
scripts.wait-and-test: node scripts/wait-for-emulators.js && npx wait-on tcp:3000 && sleep 10 && npm run cypress:run
scripts.wait-and-open: node scripts/wait-for-emulators.js && npx wait-on http-get://localhost:3000/api/health && npm run cypress:open
scripts.test:integration: npm run e2e:setup && firebase emulators:exec --only functions 'jest --runInBand --selectProjects integration'
scripts.test:integration:ci: npm run e2e:setupci && firebase emulators:exec --only functions 'jest --runInBand --selectProjects integration --coverage --coverageDirectory=coverage/integration'
scripts.test:e2e:ci: npm run e2e:setupci && concurrently -k --success first -n 'EMULATORS,APP,WAIT,CYPRESS' -c 'blue.bold,green.bold,yellow.bold,magenta.bold' "npm run emulators:start" "npm run next:start-ci" "npm run wait-and-test-ci"
scripts.wait-and-test-ci: node scripts/wait-for-emulators.js && npm run wait:next && npm run warm-pages && npm run cypress:run
